body_html:
@mrry sorry for some typo in last post and I have fixed in the post.
And can you recommend some tool for debugging the tensorflow source? I am not so familiar with Linux coding envioronment, but I think there should be some handy tool can do breakpoint / step over / step in ....... . I did try gdb, but it cannot link to the source code, maybe I didn't build the source right? ( I followed the [https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.10/get_started/os_setup.html#installing-from-sources], it works)

body:
@mrry sorry for some typo in last post and I have fixed in the post. 
And can you recommend some tool for debugging the tensorflow source? I am not so familiar with Linux coding envioronment, but I think there should be some handy tool can do breakpoint / step over / step in ....... . I did try gdb, but it cannot link to the source code, maybe I didn't build the source right?  ( I followed the [https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.10/get_started/os_setup.html#installing-from-sources], it works)
